content.p: Omar Minhaj, a third-year Mechanical Engineering student, talks about the benefits of a Nottingham Engineering degree, his career prospects, life in Malaysia and even has some advice for prospective students! Tan Sang Huey is in her fourth year studying MEng Mechanical Engineering. See what she has to say about what attracted her to Mechanical Engineering, the range of modules on offer and why she enjoys working with machines. Chen Xinwei, a Mechanical Engineering PhD student, discusses the scholarships on offer for PhD students and why this research area was the right choice for her. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
